regen.absent_element: action to minimize loudspeaker volume when the handset is lifted
regen.new_specification: The system shall minimize the loudspeaker volume when the handset is lifted, transferring the communication to the handset.

regen.new_specification: When the handset is lifted, the system shall minimize the loudspeaker volume to prevent feedback.

label: Picking up the handset shall reduce the loudspeaker volume to its minimum level.
